Control Name: 3.8.7 There are goals on database query efficiency.
Control Statement: Ensuring the data operations are optimized is a key component to any performance assessment. It is important to understand what data is being queried and when. The data life-cycle, if abused, can adversely affect the performance of any application (or microservice). Confirm that a database administrator (a data architect is preferred) is part of the assessment as they will have the necessary tools for monitoring and optimizing a database and its queries.
